unparsed_output:
There are two types of committees within ILSI as stated in the 'Committees' section, namely "Technical Committees" and "Scientific Expert Committees".

Here is an excerpt from the text: "Within ILSI there are two types of committees: Technical Committees and Scientific Expert Committees. Both generate and disseminate scientific information on national and international questions of interest to the members, but each committee has its own set of objectives and membership format."
